com.ffbit.maven.solr

Class AbstractSolrConfigurationMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.ffbit.maven.solr.AbstractSolrConfigurationMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArtifactResolverConfiguration, SolrVersionConfiguration, BootstrapConfiguration, JettyConfiguration, org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSolrMojo

    public abstract class AbstractSolrConfigurationMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
implements JettyConfiguration, ArtifactResolverConfiguration, BootstrapConfiguration
    General place for Solr Maven Plugin configuration stuff.
